definition: to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet

sentences.english: Football is played in all weathers, including rain and snow.
sentences.chinese: 可以在气候下玩橄榄球，包括雨天和雪天。

sentences.english: They wear galoshes in wet weather.
sentences.chinese: 他们在下雨天穿胶套鞋。

sentences.english: The chairs are sheltered to ensure operation under the raining weather.
sentences.chinese: 缆车都设有遮雨棚，以确保在雨天照常运行。

sentences.english: At that time, rainy days, the experiment is far from clear.
sentences.chinese: 当时阴雨天，实验的现象很不明显。

sentences.english: In rain or fog ventilation is not particularly humid environment not construction.
sentences.chinese: 在雨天雾天或特别潮湿不通气的环境中不能施工。

sentences.english: On grey mornings of rain I have crooned many an idle song.
sentences.chinese: 在灰暗的雨天的早晨，我吟哦过许多飘逸的诗篇。

sentences.english: These accidents always cause traffic jams on rainy days.
sentences.chinese: 下雨天出车祸往往引起堵车。

sentences.english: When it rains, I don't like take umbrella.
I cooked outside -- rain or shine -- on a rocket stove I made.
sentences.chinese: 无论晴雨天，我都用自制的火箭炉在户外做饭。

sentences.english: Things easily get damp on a rainy day.
SERIES】A series of rainy days spoiled their vacation.
sentences.chinese: 连日的雨天，破坏了他们的假期。

sentences.english: Especially likes in the rainy day knocking on the wet front door.
sentences.chinese: 尤其喜欢在雨天去叩湿湿的大门。

sentences.english: A rainy day can also be quick to dry clothes quickly.
sentences.chinese: 下雨天也可以迅速快捷凉干衣服。

sentences.english: What's your favorite way to pass a rainy day?
sentences.chinese: 在大雨天你最喜欢如何打发时间？

sentences.english: Just as God has a purpose for sunshine and rain.
sentences.chinese: 正如上帝决定了睛天和雨天一样。

definition: to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
to get wet in the rain
Yushui or Rain Water, 2nd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 19th February-5th March
to take shelter from the rain
to collect water/to be covered with water/to pond/accumulated water/ponding
